name: solid skull granny square
notes:
type of instructions
- written instructions - english only and us crochet terminology used.
- visual help - paid version only.
- stitch breakdown - paid version only.
- joining tutorial - paid version only.
- blocking help.

skill level
- you must know how to crochet.
- you must know how to read a crochet pattern.
- you must know basic crochet stitches - ch, sc, sk, dc etc
- you must know how to skip stitches.
- you must know how to follow crochet written instructions.
- best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters.

finished size
- 3.75 inches approx

yarn & hook
- yarnsmiths pebble haze aran or any aran yarn.
- scrap yarn was used so no yards will be given.
- 5mm crochet hook.

terms of use
- for personal use only. do not copy, share or sell the pattern in part or whole. you may sell the finished item made using this pattern.

refund policy
- all digital sales are final.

about:
truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns. this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern.
